json.text: Hi.My name is Sonya Amrita and I want to talk to you today about Divine Abundance and specifically,
financial freedom from an awakened perspective, from a spiritual perspective, And the quality
or potential that we have in our lives to live freedom from the inside out.
First I want to ask you a question.
What does it mean to you to be financially free?
When you think about financial freedom, what do you associate with that?
I think if you're like most people, and certainly if you’ve bought into what our society has
trained us to think about, then you associate financial freedom with some combination of
having money or a certain amount of income, having assets, things, houses, cars, having
time, and maybe even freedom of choice.
And all of those things are wonderful, and while it's true that we want support everyone
in our lives to live in an external experience of abundance, what unfortunately I've seen
over and over and over again, is that those external things don’t give any body a sustained
experience of true empowered everlasting freedom.
I know an unfortunate number of very, very wealthy people who are making hundreds of
thousands and millions of dollars.
And they have way more than they need to live and thrive, who are stressed out, burned out,
still in conflict and really in a kind of prison.
Either around making money or not having time or not having energy and that's not true abundance.
That's not true liberated abundance.
That’s having a thing and still being unhappy and not necessarily feeling free.
I hope that distinction makes sense.
Don’t get me wrong.
Again, having money or things, whatever it is that you need, is great and I want to affirm,
like I talked about in the last video, that there is an intelligence and wisdom to divine
abundance.
So when it flows in and through your life, it will create an internal and external abundance
that is aligned and true and loving and in integrity, and natural for you - whatever
that looks like.
And I fully support you to embrace that and discover whatever that is.
And the pathway to get that, the pathway to experience to experience that quality of divine
alignment and freedom isn't about chasing after these external things and these external
ideas of financial freedom.
It starts from the inside out.
And I’m really called to name and to take it another step further - which is actually
any time you trick yourself into buying into the story that you’re freedom is dependant
on something outside of you, you're actually in a sense betraying something inside you
that knows the truth, it knows what true freedom is, it knows the truth of divine abundance
and love.
And I want to empower that wisdom in you that already knows this truth.
Even if this is new for you, it's something you can tap into and honour and feel right
now.
So, let's talk a little about what financial freedom really is from the perspective of
divine abundance.
First I want to talk about the emotions around financial freedom.
You know, most of the time I find that when somebody is looking for financial freedom,
what they are really asking for is to release the stress, anxiety, judgments, conflicts,
sacrifice, struggle, unhealthy amount of hard work - whatever that is - they want freedom
from that.
And it's kind of an innocent confusion but it is not necessarily correct to think “If

That doesn’t work.
It might alleviate the pressure for a minute longer if you're lucky, but it won't sustain.

What maybe it's more true to say abundance freedom since it's not just about finances,

Divine abundance is vast.

To walk through the gateway of divine abundance?
I am called to give you a really simple almost silly metaphor about this.
So, if were to give you the castle of your dreams anywhere in the world, all expenses

is you had to go through all your clothing and choose all the things that no longer fit

It's really kind of that simple, These old ideas and all this conditioning - it's like

It is not aligned to your true self, your inner wisdom, and you can let it go.

So the first one is - all about your relationship to your condition.
And how to have a healthy relationship in a sense to this conditioning.
What most people do is that they will make 1 of 2 mistakes - and they either judge or

It's almost like you take half a step back and lovingly witness “Wow, I went through

You can even have an appreciation and gratitude for the you of the past, all that you survived,

All that your conditioning has taught you.
And compassionately witnessing then brings you to a space of freedom where you can take

It's just like looking at the pile of clothes you've sorted out and saying “Well I have

I am free to bring them to goodwill.”
And so you are free to release these stories.
And then the third step becomes really important because just being willing to let go of these
